item.title:
SM Entertainment issues official statement following EXO's Baekhyun, Chen and Xiumin filing lawsuits due to overdue payments and unreasonable deals:
“we have confirmed that external forces are approaching our artists (...) the outside forces don't really think about the artist… Show more
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
In a statement, the three members reveal that SM Entertainment owes them overdue payment and has offered unreasonable deals such as trying to extend their contracts by at least 17 years.
: https://v.daum.net/v/20230601095112176…
item.author: PopBase

item.title: EXO's Baekhyun, Chen and Xiumin have filed an official lawsuit to terminate their contracts with SM Entertainment.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
Ryan Gosling on the criticism of him playing Ken:
“Suddenly, it’s like, ‘we’ve cared about Ken this whole time.’ No, you didn’t. You never did. You never cared. Barbie never fucked with Ken. That’s the point. If you ever really cared about Ken, you would know that nobody cared… Show more
